item.title: Reflecting on the Life of Rebeccah Blum, Accomplished Curator, Editor, and Translator
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Rebeccah Blum, a curator, translator, editor, and mother, died in Berlin on July 22. She was murdered by her former partner, British-born photographer Saul Fletcher, who subsequently committed suicide at Blum‚Äôs country home.
